message.content:
<<<api>>>: PrintWriter.write
<<<code>>>: 
import java.io.File;
import java.io.FileWriter;
import java.io.PrintWriter;
import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.Scanner;

class Pes {
    private String Ime;
    private String Pasma;
    private int Starost;
    private double Teza;

    public void setIme(String Ime) {
        this.Ime = Ime;
    }

    public String getIme() {
        return Ime;
    }

    public void setPasma(String Pasma) {
        this.Pasma = Pasma;
    }

    public String getPasma() {
        return Pasma;
    }

    public void setStarost(int Starost) {
        this.Starost = Starost;
    }

    public int getStarost() {
        return Starost;
    }

    public void setTeza(double Teza) {
        this.Teza = Teza;
    }

    public double getTeza() {
        return Teza;
    }

    Pes() {
        Ime = "";
        Pasma = "";
        Starost = 0;
        Teza = 0;
    }
}

public class Aplikacija {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        ArrayList<Pes> pesList = new ArrayList<>();
        Scanner input = new Scanner(System.in);

        for (int i = 0; i < 5; i++) {
            System.out.println("Vpišite ime!");
            String Ime = input.nextLine();
            System.out.println("Vpišite pasmo!");
            String Pasma = input.nextLine();
            System.out.println("Izberite starost!");
            int Starost = input.nextInt();
            System.out.println("Izberite tezo!");
            double Teza = input.nextDouble();
            input.nextLine();

            Pes pes = new Pes();
            pes.setIme(Ime);
            pes.setPasma(Pasma);
            pes.setStarost(Starost);
            pes.setTeza(Teza);

            pesList.add(pes);
        }
        input.close();

        try {
            PrintWriter writer = new PrintWriter(new FileWriter("Psi.txt"));
            for (Pes pes : pesList) {
                writer.write("Ime: " + pes.getIme() + ", Pasma: " + pes.getPasma() + ", Starost: " + pes.getStarost() + ", Teza: " + pes.getTeza() + "\n");
            }
            writer.close();
            System.out.println("Data written to Psi.txt successfully.");
        } catch (Exception e) {
            System.out.println("An error occurred while writing to Psi.txt.");
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }
}

<<<explanation>>>: 
In this code, we first create an ArrayList called pesList to store the Pes objects. We then use a for loop to prompt the user for the details of 5 dogs and create Pes objects with those details. Each Pes object is added to the pesList.

After collecting the data, we close the Scanner object.

Next, we create a PrintWriter object and pass it a FileWriter object with the file name "Psi.txt". We then iterate over the pesList and use the PrintWriter's write method to write the details of each Pes object to the file. We append a newline character after each entry to separate them.

Finally, we close the PrintWriter and display a success message if the writing process was successful. If an exception occurs during the writing process, we catch it and display an error message along with the stack trace.
